title: Beyondpersonalizedgifts.com - Drop Ship Business
text: Questions Business Summary Go beyond just giving a gift, but give a gift that is memorable! No matter the occasion BeyondPersonalizedGifts.com has the perfect present to give that special someone. Site includes: - Exclusive 40 Hour Step-by-Step Ecommerce Consulting and Training Program - 100% Responsive Design for Optimal Shopping Experience - Make a great first impression with a beautiful responsive design that works well on PCs, tablets and smart phones - Built for optimal search results! - All New Website Framework - includes page caching system for faster loading, call to action banners to promote sales & products, abandon cart feature, product review features, built-in image zoom, Ajax product filter, one page checkout option, built-in newsletter & blog - a total of 16 modules for optimal marketing capabilities! - Access to the Pure-Ecommerce ELearning Library ï¿½ FREE UPDATES! - Access to Webinars and Teaching Sessions - 800 Drop Shipped Products Loaded - Drop Ship Product Vendors Researched in Specified Market - Drop Ship Product Vendors Contacted & Applied to Setup Relationship - Approved Product Vendor Relationships Transferred at Time of Purchase - Pure-Ecommerce Premium Shopping Cart - SEO Specific Keyword Names for All Pages Creating a Keyword Specific URL - Meta Tag Descriptions Completed For All Category and Sub-Category Pages - Site Map Submitted to Google - Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest & Blog Icons Connected to Your Home page - Matching Social Media Pages - Matching Business Card Design (printing not included) - jQuery Slide Show Feature - Product Zoom Feature Built In - Product Review/Product Rating Feature
